title: Worst experience ever!
text:
Visited the Acropolis this evening (because of the heat in the afternoon) with my sister and her 3 little boys. All very excited to see the Acropolis. We bought our tickets at 19:15 but we were not told that you have to start leaving the highest point at 19:50.

We start walking assuming we would have enough time. After 10 minutes a lady tells us we have to walk faster and when we reached the top we were told we had to walk immediately back downstairs.

The way the people were asked to go downstairs was not friendly. It was quite aggressive. The people were treated like cattle and I really couldn't believe my eyes. We had to walk so near to each other because they wanted everybody out at 20:00 o'clock. Walking with so many people so near to each other not taking into account that there is the corona virus.

The stairs are quite slippery and my sister got nervous because of the workers yelling at the people. She fell off the stairs with her 2 year old son in het arms. My nephew of 6 years old also fell off the stairs and the same happened to a man walking behind us.

So I paid 20 euros to go through a gate to be told they will close and then to be treated I a way that was far from human.

Tip 1: tell the people you're closing at 19:50 if they enter after 18:30

Tip 2: find another way to get everybody out of the Akropolis at 20:00.

title: So tasty!
text:
The food was really delicious! We had a soup, salad, falafel and eggplant. It was all very tasty.

The waiters were friendly but also very busy.

Location is good.

title: Amazing food!
text:
Sometimes you find a place and everything is just perfect. We were in Edinburgh for the weekend and wanted to eat something traditional. We shared the vegetarian haggis and the lamb shank. It was so good that we went back here for lunch the next day. We were lucky to have a table because only after 15 minutes the place was full.

We had a friendly and patient waiter. Location is also very good. Very central.

The only thing I would suggest is to do something about the toilets. The floor was sticky.

title: Loved it!
text:
Had dinner here and it was amazing. It was very refined. Beautiful combinations. The cheese platter was also very tasty. The food and the service were so good that we also had breakfast here the next morning. We had some nice eggs.
Location is very nice. At the canal.

title: Food is good
text:
Had dinner here with a friend. It's a nice cosy small restaurant in the city centre of Amsterdam. The food was very good. It was a good combination of vegetarian and meat dishes. Deer carpaccio, chestnuts, beetroot, red meat... It was really delicious!

We had the menu du chef with 4 dishes. So the menu was going to be a surprise. The only thing I didn't like was the reaction of the waitress when I told her about my allergy and the things I really don't eat. She really made me feel like it was too much to ask the chef to take this into account.

title: Loved it!
text:
We had dinner here for my sister her birthday. It was quite an experience. Loved the entrance, the ambiance, the interior and most of all the food. It's very refined. Beautiful for the eye and a party for the taste buds. The waiters were also very friendly and attentive. Location is very good. In the city centre.

The only downside was the moment the wine was served. The waiter walked to our table and poured the wine into the glass without telling anything about the wine. There was also no wine tasting before the glass was filled. It was a friendly waiter but yes, it did bother me.

title: The food was good the waitress not
text:
Our hamburgers were very good. We had breadless hamburs. Very special. The fries were really amazing and the sauce was also very special.

Despite that the food was very good I didn't have a good experience. The waitress was in a bad mood and every question was too much. There was also no ambiance in the restaurant.

title: Nice!
text: In the middle of a shopping street. We were tired of walking and really needed something small to eat. And then we saw this place. We had some cakes and a coffee. There is no seating but that's ok. The cakes and coffee were both good.

title: Loved it
text: Had a small ice cream but it's really enough for one person. Had the taste coconut and pistachio. Both were very good.

title: Just perfect!
text:
We had an amazing cheese platter with 3 kind of cheeses. As a main we had octopus and lamb. Everything was delicious. The next day we were still talking about how good it was.

The waiter was very friendly and explained everything very well.

title: Amazing
text: Ok, so this is really the best place for the pasteis de Belem! It is always very busy. You can do take away or have a table. They have different spaces to sit. We had the famous pasteis de Belem and tosti's. Both were very good.

title: Nice interior
text:
I liked the restaurant the way it looks. Very nice interior.

The food wasn't what we expected. The vegetables were very simple and had no taste. The potatoes same. I did like the fish. Dessert was big but not very sophisticated. I prefer something small with more taste. The cheeses were normal. It's a pity the waiter didn't tell us what kind of cheeses we were having.

The waitress was very impatient.
The waiter who helped us was very friendly.

title: Very good meat!
text:
We had our best dinner in Lisbon here. The meat was tender and so delicious. The potatoes and veggies were very good. And our dessert was the best I ever had! Mango ice, pineapple from the grill, coconut cake and hot coconut milk.
The waiters were very kind and helpful.

title: Nice!
text:
We were on our way for lunch to another restaurant but it seemed to be closed. Then we went to this place. From the outside we were not sure what kind of place it would be. A winebar but there are also nice salads and sandwiches on the menu.
Waiters were friendly and the food was good.

title: Delicious
text: Had cocos and pistachio and both were delicious. They really make an effort to make a pretty flower of ice for you.

title: Jammie jammie
text:
Love this formula. You get a salad as a starter en then the fries and entrecote. The fries were a little bit too oily but the entrecote and sauce were delicious. Waiters are very friendly and you could see the were enjoying their work.
Only thing I would change is the colour yellow everywhere.....

title: Nice place
text: Loved this place. It's a small place with only a couple of dishes on the menu. The waiters were very friendly and explained how they work. Location is good. It's not in the busy touristic streets bit still walkable.

title: Never again
text: Location is very good. Opposite to the train station. We had a salad with some drinks. The salad was ok but not very special. There were also some missing ingredients. We didn't tell the waitress (maybe owner) because she was very rude. She made some unfriendly comments. I pretended like I didn't hear her. At the end we were asked if we wanted a dessert. We said no and immediately we got the bill while we were still having drinks. I didn't feel like leaving at that moment so I didn't pick up the bill. 5 minutes later she comes to our table and she says that the bill has to be paid now. Maybe she was like: "you're just a tourist so you will never come back". In that she is right. I will never come back...

title: Loved this place!
text: Had brunch here with some friends. We were lucky to have a table outside. Loved my bun with eggs, avocado, spinach.... They also have a lot of sweet stuff for with your tea/ coffee.

title: Soooo good!
text:
We had dinner here with a group of 12 people. The food was really delicious. There was fish, meat bit also a lot of vegetables.
Waiters were friendly.
Location is very good. Very central in Amsterdam. Nice interior also.

title: Hmmm
text: We had lunch here. The food wasn't something special. The salad was tasteless. The service wasn't good. Had to wait a long time.

title: Like being home
text: We had lunch here. Soup with bread. It was very good. Typical Greek place. I really felt like I was sitting in my mom's kitchen.

title: Very charming place
text: Very small but also very charming. Nice fresh juices. Location is good. A lot of restaurants and cafes nearby

title: Soooo good!
text: Small place with a couple of seats. But that doesn't matter. The food is very good and the people who work there are very kind.

title: Loved this place!
text: The food was so good that we came back 2 days later again. We got mastica ice cream and baklava as a dessert. Delicious! Location is also very good. In a street with a lot of restaurants and cafes.

title: Loved it
text: I really loved this place. The waiters were very friendly. The food was delicious. Location is also good. Very central.

title: Simple but ok
text: The cafe is located in the Cambridge botanic garden. You can sit inside or outside on the terrace. I prefer the terrace. Nice view over the garden. There is no service. You have to order inside.

title: Nice interior
text:
Had lunch here for the first time. Interior is very nice. Had a table next to the window. Happy about the location but the table was not clean.

I had a croquet. It was ok but not special. My sister had a salad. She really didn't like it. It didn't taste good and there was too much sauce on it.

The waitress was kind but with every question she had to ask somebody else for an answer.

title: Nice place
text:
Had drinks and dinner with friends at their terrace. Friendly waiters.

The food was good. The only thing was: There was sand in the spinach of the vegetarian dish of my friend.

Location is very good. There are a lot of cafes and restaurants around this place.

title: Nice burger
text:
Had a really nice burger here. The fries were also delicious.

You have to order at the bar. Waiters will bring the food when ready.

Location is good. City centre of Oxford.

title: Nice place
text:
Really loved this place. The food was good, friendly waiters, comfortable sitting...

Location is also good. It's in the middle of the city centre of Oxford.

title: Always coming back
text:
Have been here many times now. The food is always good.

Location is good. Almost next to the Albert Cuyp market.

title: Really too good
text:
This place is really too good! The food is always fresh and delicious! The owners have their own kitchen garden. They are really passionate about food.

Location is very good. In the middle of the centre of Amsterdam. The place is quite small. So if you want to be sure of a table it's better to make a reservation.

title: Lovely
text:
Loved this place. We had a goat cheese salad, granola, fruits, croissants and thee. It was all very good. Prices are a little bit high but the good food is worth it.

Location is good. Only thing is that the terrace is next to the street. That's why we had a table inside.

title: Very nice place!
text:
Really loved this place!
We had a hamburger, goat cheese sandwich, tosti and croquettes. All was good. Although it was very busy, the waiters were very friendly.

Location is also very good. In the middle of the centre of Ootmarsum.

title: Very good!
text:
We enjoyed lunch and the view from the nice terrace. Lunch was very good. We had a goat cheese sandwich and croquettes. Waiters were friendly.

Nice place to have a walk in the surrounding. There are forest and meadows around the hotel.

title: Nice place for coffee
text:
We had breakfast here. It's a buffet.
Nice bread and delicious vegetables.
I think the prices are a little bit high.
There was also only 1 guy working behind the desk/ bar. So took a long time to....

Nice place to sit in the morning and work behind your laptop.

title: Loved it
text:
Had lunch here with a friend.
The food was very good.

Location is good. At central station Amsterdam.
Nice view over the water.

Toilets are outside the restaurant.

title: Loved this place
text:
I just loved this place.
Had lunch here. Salad with chicken, mango and avocado. Fresh orange juice and thee.

You have to order at the counter and the waiter will bring your order to your table.

Nice decoration. Beautiful plants. Nice art on the walls and ceiling.

title: Nice interior
text:
Had some drinks outside at the terrace. Friendly waitress.

Went inside to have a look at all the movie pictures. Just loved it.

Location is good. Old city centre.

title: Nice place
text:
It is a nice family restaurant with very kind waiters. Location is a little bit hidden.

I had a pizza. It was very good.

title: Nice place but the food is nothing special
text:
We were here for lunch.
We got the coffee milk 15 minutes after we got our coffee...
The pizza was cold.
The fish and chips were good.
The sandwich was not refined. There were 4 big pieces of dry chicken breast. I prefer 1 tasteful piece.

The restaurant looks good. Nice ambiance.

Waiters were friendly.

title: Nice ambiance
text:
Nice place. You can sit inside and outside.

The food was good but not special.
The waiters were friendly.
Location is good. Surrounded by many bars and restaurants.

title: Loved this pizza
text:
Location is good. This pizza express is in a shopping mall at orchard road.
The pizza was very good. I would definitely come back if I would be in the neighborhood.

title: Nice place
text:
We had a table outside at the terrace. You look over the river.
We had a hamburger and lamb chops. Both were good.

Location is very good. Surrounded by many bars and restaurants.

title: Good food
text:
The food is very good. Especially the braised beef. Just loved it.

Waiters were friendly but didn't have much time. It was so busy. It's a very nice place but it can be a little bit too loud.

title: Nice pizza
text:
The pizza was very good.

Friendly and attentive waiters.

Location is in a cozy neighbourhood but not very central.

title: Nice hamburger
text:
We had steak and a hamburger. Both were good. The fries were also nice and crispy.

Waiters were ok but not the friendliest.

Location is in the financial district of Amsterdam.

title: Nice place
text:
The food is good.
Waiters were friendly.
Nice view. Looking over the water.
Open kitchen.
Best thing was the ambiance.

title: Good food and service was the best!
text:
We had a high tea here with a group of 8. We had a soup, quiche, sandwiches, cake, macorones, brownies etc. It was all very good.

Service was really the best you can have. Very friendly and helpful.

Location is good. Two stops with the bus from central station. There is also a terrace looking over the water.

title: Amazing experience!
text:
It's a the total package that makes it an amazing experience. The building (former prison), the delicious pieces of art on the plates, the little shop with wines and other products, and of course the service. It was all very good.

We had the 7 course menu. We picked 4 ourselves and let the chef decide the other 3.

After dinner we had a look in the kitchen. Always nice in a 3 restaurant!

title: Delicious pizza
text:
We ordered 2 pizzas. Both were good.
We had a very friendly waiter.

Prices are ok.
Location is good. City centre of Zwolle.

title: Amazing place
text:
The place used to be a church. Now it is a bookstore and a cafe.

I had croquettes on bread and coffee. It was good. The best thing about the place is the ambiance. I could walk there for hours looking for books.

title: Loved it
text:
We ordered sushi, salmon and black Angus beef. It was all good.

Waiters were friendly.

Ambiance was good. Nice decoration. Depending on your table you can look into the kitchen.

Location is good. Near to the train station.

title: Best ice cream!
text:
The best ice cream I have ever had in the Netherlands!

They have a lot of different tastes. Love the caramel nut explosion scoops.

Prices are good.

title: No service
text:
We entered this place on a Sunday afternoon.
Ordered drinks and croquettes. After 30 minutes we still didn't get the croquettes. Had to go to look for waiters and ask for it. They forgot but didn't say sorry.
15 minutes later we got our croquettes. We asked for mustard. The waiter didn't get it immediately from the kitchen. He first went to other tables. The croquettes were getting cold. We waited for another 10 minutes and then went to the kitchen ourselves....

It was not busy so the waiters just didn't do their work as they should.

Restaurant is dark. Fake flowers and old-fashioned. Toilet paper was finished.

Location is good. In the middle of the centre of Hengelo. The terrace outside was also nice. Good for the smokers.

title: Very good
text:
Love this new location! So much better then the old place. Ambiance is very good. Waiters are friendly. It feels like there is always a party going on.

The food is very good. Grown up with this kind of food. So coming to this restaurant in an Asian country feels like coming home.

title: Best fries ever!
text:
They have the best fries! I have had them many times now and it is always of the same high quality.

Location is good. Very central between the shops in the city centre.

title: Best Greek!
text:
The food was delicious and the service was the kindest!

Location is good in the citycentre of Hengelo.

title: Perfection in every way!
text:
We had the 3 course surprise menu. It was really very good. Beautiful presentation and very tasty! We were surprised by the low price. Only €37 for this menu.

Waiters were very helpful. Special requests were no problem.

Interior is nice.

Location is good. Very central in the city centre of Amsterdam.

title: Delicious salad!
text:
My friend and I had 2 different salads. One with salmon and one with falafel. Both were delicious! Also quite big. You are really full at the end.

People working there were very kind.

Location is good. Near to Rembrandtplein.

title: Nice pizza
text:
We had the pizza prosciutto and the pizza spinac. Both were good.

Waiters were friendly but it was difficult to get their attention.

Location is good. Middle of the centre.

The bread you get at the beginning is€2,1 a person. Don't like surprises.

title: Simple but ok
text:
We had Wiener schnitzel and sachertarte. Both were ok.

Waiters were friendly but sometimes it was difficult to get their attention.

Location is good.

What I didn't like was the smoking of the other guests. But maybe that's normal in Austria.

title: Nice coffee
text:
We just had coffee and chocolate cake. Both were ok.

Location is very good. Near to the St. Stephan church. Nice to sit on the first floor next to the window and watch people passing by.

We were sitting on the first floor. The café on the ground floor is smoking. The café on the first floor non smoking.

title: Average
text:
We had tea, scones and macaroons. It was ok but nothing special.

Nice place to sit. Very cosy.

It was not busy but still it was hard to get the attention of the waiters.

Location is in a side street in the middle of the centre of Cambridge.

The toilet was very big and clean.

title: Average place
text:
We had the rustique primavera pizza and for the children the bambini menu. The pizza was very good. The bambini menu was nothing special.

The place is big. 2 levels. Good place for children. It is big, they can walk around or colour. It can be a little bit too noisy when it is busy.

The waiters are friendly and trying their best to give good service.

Location is good. In the middle of the centre of Cambridge.

title: Good coffee
text:
We had coffee, chocolate milk and something sweet. It was all good.

Friendly waiters. Also quick service.

Had the seat in front of the window looking over Kings chapel. Very nice!

Location is good. In the centre of Cambridge.

In the back of the café I saw a lot of people studying/ working. Nice place to relax, work and have your coffee.

title: Food is good. Place is not..
text:
We had sandwiches. They were very good. Very authentic Italian.

We went there before lunchtime. Reason: the place is very small and gets very busy during lunchtime. Many times there are people waiting outside to get a seat.

So the food is very good. The place not. Take away is an option.

title: Tasty food
text:
We ordered vegetarian samosas, malai kofta curry, dhal maharani, biryani rice and naan for 4 persons. It was all really good. Quite spicy. So tell them if you don't want to spicy food.

The waiters are friendly. The restaurant is big and there is a good atmosphere. There was life music when we were there.

It is more expensive then most Indian restaurants but the food and service are so good that it is worth it.

title: Good food in a nice place
text:
We had the Rambo hamburger, corny fries, naughty fries, roasted almonds, Sicilian green olives and the open hot cookie ice cream sandwich. All were good but the naughty fries and open hot cookie were really amazing.

Ambiance is good. Nice decoration. Like you are on a set.

Waiters are friendly.

Nice rooftop bar.

Good experience except for the drinks. We were there on a Sunday evening. Several things were finished. So we had to change our drinks. The drinks we then ordered were really to sweet.

title: Average
text:
Pasta was good.
Didn't like the bruchetta.
There was sand in the salad.

Location is good. Near to central station.

Avoid peek hours. When it is very busy the lines for the pasta are long....

title: Nothing special
text:
Food is ok but not more then that.

Location is good. Quiet street near to the Spanish steps. Big umbrella, so you have shadow.

Our waitress was not friendly.

title: No no go
text:
We had an ice cream here.
The ice was very sugary and we really didn't like it.
The cone was not tasty.
The toilet was dirty.
I am not sure if she was the owner but the lady working there was so not friendly....

title: Yummie food
text:
We had pizza, steak and tiramisu. All were very good.

The place is nice. You can sit inside and outside.

When we were there all clients seemed to be Italian. My family and I were the only tourist.

Location is a little bit far from the centre of Rome. But if you have a car it is ok.

title: Good food, amazing view
text:
Ordered black Angus steak, fries out of the oven and a salad from the salad bar. The salad bar and the fries from the oven were very good. The meat was not very tender. So a lot of chewing
..

Location is very good. Very central in the city of Amsterdam. There are 2 terraces. One on the ground floor and one on the first floor. Amazing view over the water.

Waitress that helped us was kind but not very experienced.

The place it self is very nice. Big bar, high ceilings, big windows and nice place to read a book or newspaper.

title: Very good coffee
text:
We ordered the sandwich with cheese and grilled vegetables. It was amazing. We had very good coffee, a croissant, a chocolate croissant and a cookie. All very good.

Waiters were kind.

Location is very good. In the " 9 straatjes ". Nice shopping area.

title: Nice view over the river.
text:
Ordered a Ceasar salad. Was very good.

Waitress was kind

Location is very good. Looking over there river.
placeLocation: Ouderkerk aan de Amstel, The Netherlands

title: Best Chocolate!
text:
Had a chocolate cake. It was very good.

Location is in the basement of a shopping mall. No place to sit.

It is quite expensive.

title: Good food
text:
We had the aubergine croquettes, homemade chips, lamb massaman curry and stir fried Australian beef tenderloin. It was all very good.

Friendly waiters.

Nice and modern interior.

Location is very good. Very central.

It is more expensive then most Thai restaurants but checking the menu in advance you would know that.

title: Nice bar
text:
We had 2 green Curry's. One with chicken and one vegetarian. Both were good but nothing special. The price is low.

The place is American style. Pictures on the wall. Big bar.

Friendly waiters.

title: Good food
text:
We ordered the patty melt burger, australian grass fed tenderloin and steamed broccoli. Liked all of them.

I think we were helped by the manager. He was very kind and professional.

Location is in a big shopping mall. Many other café's and restaurants.

title: Best view ever
text:
We went there for drinks on the terras. Reservation of a table only possible if spending $60 pp. So we didn't make a reservation. We were there around 18:30. Beautiful view. When it got dark even better!

We ordered the sizzler beef and fat chips. Both were good.

Waiters were kind but you notice that it can be busy with people who come for the view, making pictures, wanting a table.....

title: Very good!
text:
Had a nice evening here. You can sit inside or outside. Nice view over the river.

Location is good. There are a lot of cafes and restaurants in Robertson Quay.

We had a quattro formoggi pizza and the grilled Angus tenderloin. Both good. As a dessert the limoncello cake. This one was really amazing!

Ambiance is good. Waiters were friendly.

title: Very busy place
text:
My friends made the reservation. It was very busy. People were waiting outside for a table. The restaurant could use a makeover. What I liked was that you can see how the pizza is made.

The bruchetta was very good. That evening I think I made a mistake by ordering gnocchi with 4 cheeses and the beef lasagna. Both were average. Friends had pizza. They loved it. Maybe Al Forno is best known for pizza and I should have ordered that.

Waiters were kind.

title: Good food but small portions for good eaters
text:
We had the guacamole, crab cones, roasted dorper lamb, a dish with chicken and a dish with beef. It was all very good! The only thing was I was still hungry at the end. For me the portions were too small. The price is not low.

Location is very good. Near to MRT. It is surrounded by a lot of other restaurants and cafes.

Waiters were kind in their on way. It felt like they did their best but they didn't know how to do it good. Like when they put a plate in the middle of the table for sharing they rushed away not telling which plate it was.

title: Love this place
text:
Have been here many times for dinner and drinks. Dinner has never disappointed me. Last time I had the beef Wellington. It was very good. Before dinner you get some bread with aioli.

They also have good cold and warm snacks for with your drinks.

Location is very good. In the centre of Amsterdam next to a canal. Near to a tram. In the summer you can sit outside next to the canal seeing all the boats passing.

Waiters are friendly.

title: Mixed feelings
text:
Had dinner here with 4 friends. Made a reservation. We had the table for 2 hours. We had the choice for a table from 19:00-21:00 or the table from 21:00 on. To me it doesn't feel good to have time pressure when you have a nice evening with your friends.

Food is good but small portions for what you pay. We had sea bass, beef Wellington, pasta, grilled asparagus and roasted potatoes.

Nice place to sit. High ceiling. Beautiful lamps. Open kitchen.

Location is good. Very central near to Dam square.

Waiters are kind. Well trained.

title: Good in every way
text:
Had dinner here with a group of four. The food was amazing. Scallops, beetroot salad, pigeon, cod, duck, chocolate mousse, creme brulee ....
Good bread and butter are served complementary before dinner.

Waiters are very friendly, attentive and helpful.

Restaurant is nice. Good ambiance.

Location is very central. Couple of minutes walking from Dam square.

title: Food for when you are in a hurry
text:
This place is great for when you are in a hurry. We were with a group of 7. We ordered our pizza and pasta and were eating in 15 minutes.

The taste of the food is a 7. Is is ok but nothing special. The portions are very big.

Waiters are very kind. Sometimes they look a little bit stressed. It can be quite busy. The place is very big.

Children love this place. There is a corner for children to play.

Location is very central. Next to the station.

title: Average
text:
One time we had dinner from their menu. I had the four cheese pizza. It was good. We were sitting in the restaurant above, the Thai restaurant. You can order there from both menu's. The reason that we wanted to sit in the other restaurant is because it is literally a sandbox. Your feet in the sand.

One time we had lunch there. My husband had chicken satay. It was ok. He also had potato wedges. He didn't like these. Very big and not much taste. The mango juices were to sweet. I think they added some sugar sirup.

title: Good food!
text:
We had 2 diners here. Nice view over the sea because it is on the first floor.

The first time we had dinner here everything was ok. The second time it was very busy and it was really too much for the waiters. We had to wait quite long. But the waiters did all they can.

I liked the lamb chops. My husband has the calamaris and green curry with purple rice. All very good.

title: Relaxing ambiance
text:
My husband and I loved this place. It is like an European coffee place/ lunch cafe. Nice ambiance. Kind waiters. Nice place to read your book. You can sit inside or outside.

We had our coffee, tea and fresh juices here. My husband also loved the coconut ice cream.

Because we loved sitting here we ordered food from the restaurant next to it and had it here. We loved the phad tay, green curry, vegetable spring rolls, foccacia with chicken and avocado. The only thing we didn't like was the fritatta with aubergine.

title: Good food & nice view
text:
My husband made the reservation and asked for a table in a quiet area. There are tables near to the bar and music. We didn't want that. We had a nice table with a great view on gardens by the bay.

The food was good. California roll, vegetarian roll, lamb chops, heilbot fish, aubergine and chocolate fondant. Minimum you have to spent per person is $80 on food.

title: Not for foodies
text:
I am familiar with middle eastern food and this was really not good. It is not that you can't eat it but it is tasteless. At the beginning you get some bread and a small plate with 3 olives, a couple of slices of tomato's, some dead mint and a little bit of spring onions. It really didn't look nice.

I had lamb bamieh. The ladyfinger was just dead. So overcooked. The rice was tasteless. My husband took the chicken and rice. He only ate the chicken. We also had the dolma.

The restaurant is in a nice area. Many restaurants, cafés and the water.

The waiters were ok.

title: Nice place
text:
I was there with a friend on a Sunday afternoon. I had a baguette with avocado, humus, eggplant and salad. It was very good. As a desert I had the coconut ice cream with espresso. That was not very special.

Nice ambiance. Little bit industrial. The only negative is that sitting is not very comfortable because they only have barstools.

title: Food is good but service....
text:
They have north and south Indian food. We tried the north Indian food. We were with an Indian vegetarian couple. They wanted to eat in an restaurant where no meat was prepared. We all liked the food. It was really very good.

Location is very good. After dinner you can go shopping at Mustafa.

Don't expect any service. We were there on a Saturday. Very busy. People waiting outside. Waiters were friendly but couldn't handle it. We even had to ask for cutlery and plates.... It is also a noisy place.

title: Busy but nice
text:
Prices are reasonable and the food is ok.
Alcohol is expensive in Singapore. Here you can drink a wine for a good price.

It is always busy.

Nice area for walking and many cafés around the restaurant.

title: Food is good
text: Have eaten here twice. Food is OK. We had lamb chops, meatballs, tsaziki, fish etc. What I didn't like was the manager/ waiter. Not friendly....

title: Nice place to sit
text:
Food is good. Had a vegetarian pasta with a lot of vegetables and Parmesan cheese. Delicious! My husband had the Smokey mozzarella pizza. He loves this one. Had it several times.

Service depends on the waiters of that day. We had very kind waiters but also some that didn't know what a smile is.

The cakes are quite expensive.

The atmosphere is good. Nice place to sit.

title: Good food
text:
I had a salad with a poached egg. For drinks an orange, carrot and ginger juice. It was all good.

My husband had the pancakes. I tried them and they were also delicious.

The place can be too busy in the weekend. Most seating is outside.
Sometimes hard to get the attention of a waiter. They are so busy but always kind.

title: It's ok
text:
Everybody gets a simple salad, bread and butter as a starter.

2 choices: meat or fish. Meat is OK. Sauce is very good. Fish is simple. Didn't like it.

Service is ok.

title: Good meat
text:
Salad and fries as much as you want.

2 choices: meat or lobster. The meat is very good. I never had the lobster.

Good service.

title: Best hamburger ever!
text:
The hamburgers are really very good.

Takes time (20 min) to get your burger but it is really worth waiting.

The place is small so don't go at the peak hours....

title: Fantastic!
text:
Everything was great.
The food was delicious.
The view was amazing. Restaurant is surrounded by trees, a river and a bridge.

Nice people working there. Very relaxing atmosphere.

title: Good food
text:
Love the quiches with the salad next to them. Tonight I had the pasta with pesto sauce, peas and zucchini. It was really delicious.

The service is good but you have to order at the counter. For me that was not a problem.

They also have delicious bread and pastries.

title: Good pasta
text:
My husband and I both had pasta. I had a home mode pasta with pesto cream sauce and asparagus. We both liked our pasta. Red wine was also OK.

Nice quiet place in an alley of the neighbourhood Shibuya.

title: Organic and delicious!
text:
Location is great ( Omotesando neighbourhood) but we passed it 2 times because it is on the 3rd floor. It is above the shop Nest Robe.

We got good home made bread. We asked for olive oil to dip it in. My husband and I shared 3 dishes. Gnocchi cheese, pasta with vegetables, steak with vegetables. They were all very good!
place: Natural Food Restaurant Nr Table Omotesando

title: Average restaurant
text:
Noisy small place.
Meat was good but to expensive for what you get.
Tables are not comfortable.
One of the waiters was very kind.

They put an amuse on the table at the beginning but don't mention you have to pay for it. Not a nice surprise when you get the bill.

title: Western bread and pastries
text:
Good quality of bread. I wanted a simple baguette with cheese and salad. It was not on the menu but they still made it for me.

Maybe the tea was a little expensive $5..

Good atmosphere.

title: Nothing special
text:
Line of 1 hour waiting outside. I expected something special.

The waitresses were kind. Had a nice table on the terras.

The food was nothing special. Tasteless omelette. Potatoes were like made in a school cafeteria. Juices were not fresh.

title: Good food
text:
Had a red curry with chicken. It was good but not like the ones you get in Thailand.

Waitresses were kind. Good atmosphere in the restaurant.
Location is in a side street so you have to know about the place.

title: Just WOW!
text:
My husband had the sandwich with avocado, harisse, lettuce, scrambled eggs, tomato and salad. I had 4 pancakes on each other. On top coconut sauce, macademia and roasted coconut flake. All just perfect.

The orange juice was served in a real orange with a straw. I prefer a glass.

Nice area to walk around.

title: Average restaurant
text:
Everything was a little bit average.
The service was not unfriendly but it felt like the atmosphere was not good.
I had a risotto parmesan cheese. It was good.

Very touristic place.

Very good view at the terrace. You are looking at the rainbow bridge
place: TO THE HERBS Aqua city Odaiba
